title: Six Deals You Need To Know About In Australia Today
text:
Image: Supplied

G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: 50% off Soniq TVs, half-price Blu-ray movies, get Call Of Duty Modern Warfare for $49 and more!

1. Half-price off Soniq TVs: If you're on the lookout for an affordable secondary TV for the kids or your bedroom, Catch's Soniq sale is well worth a look. You can bag up to 50% off select models with prices starting at $159. Cheap! Click here.

2. Big W clearance sale: Big W is having a big clearance sale across multiple categories including home appliances, 4K TVs, fashion, Blu-rays, books and cosmetics. Save up to 95%! Click here to see the deals.

3. Call Of Duty Modern Warfare for $49: eBay is selling the latest Call Of Duty game at half-price when you use the discount code 'PLUSPLAY'. To get the deal, you need to be an eBay Plus member, which currently offers a free trial. Click here!

4. 50% off Blu-ray movies: Amazon is chucking another Blu-ray and DVD clearance with 50% off select titles, including box sets and 4K Blu-rays. Click here!

5. Up to 60% off at eBay: eBay's Sales & Events portal currently has some killer bargains on video games, power tools, cookware, electric shavers, Apple tech and more. You can save up to 60% off on select products. Click here!

6. Cheap 90Mbps NBN: NBN 100 plans tend to max out at around 80MBps during peak usage times. Superloop just upped the ante with a guaranteed evening speed of 90Mbps. You can also get one month free when you use the discount code 'SLNBN'. Here are the details!

Find more great bargains at Lifehacker Coupons.

As Lifehacker editors we write about stuff we like and think you'll like too. Lifehacker often has affiliate partnerships, so we may get a share of the revenue from your purchase.
description: G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: 50% off Soniq TVs, half-price Blu-ray movies, get Call Of Duty Modern Warfare for $49 and more!...
